summary: Newport-City 2029: Major, an advanced female cyborg, is in charge of the anti-terrorism etc. unit reporting directly to the government. Taking out terrorists and freeing hostages at an embassy doesn't go smoothly. Major investigates why.
cast: Maaya Sakamoto|Ken'ichirô Matsuda|Ikkyu Juku|Kazuya Nakai|Kenji Nojima|Mayumi Asano|Megumi Han|Miyuki Sawashiro|Mugihito|Naoto|Shunsuke Sakuya|Takurou Nakakuni|Tarusuke Shingaki|Yôji Ueda|Atsushi Miyauchi|Felecia Angelle|Philip Annarella|Dawn Michelle Bennett|Z. Charles Bolton|Bradley Campbell|Patric Carroll|Clifford Chapin|Dallas Clifton|Cynthia Cranz|Kul Das|Aaron Dismuke|Jason Douglas|Cris George|Kenny Green|Josh Grelle|Chris Guerrero|Sean Hennigan|Jeremy Inman|Jeff Johnson|David Matranga|Elizabeth Maxwell|Robert McCollum|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|Kristen McGuire|Skyler McIntosh|Patrick Morphy|Trina Nishimura|Alex Organ|Phil Parsons|Daniel Penz|Kyle Phillips|Brandon Potter|Chris Rager|Aaron Roberts|Michelle Rojas|Christopher Sabat|Jad Saxton|Ian Sinclair|Marcus D. Stimac|John Swasey|Eric Vale|David Wald|Kent Williams|Brian Witkowicz
title: Ghost in the Shell: The Rising
